Package com.luigisgro.cqf.pca

Implementation of the Principal Component Analysis needed for the HJM model.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CurveTimeSeriesMatrixAdapter<T extends TimePoint> A wrapper of CurveTimeSeries that exposes the Matrix interface, to enable matrix arithmetic on curve time series
JacobiDiagonalization This stand-alone class implements the Jacobi rotation diagonalization of symmetric matrices.
PCA<T extends TimePoint> The top-level class implementing PCA on the covariance matrix of a curve time series
 

Package com.luigisgro.cqf.pca Description

Implementation of the Principal Component Analysis needed for the HJM model. The algorithm to find the eigenvalues and eigenvectors of the covariance matrix is the iterative method based on Jacobi rotations.
